Thank you for your gift to PETA!

{user_data~First Name}, thank you so much for your gift of {receipt_data~amount}. Your generous donation will support our vital work for animals. Whether in secretive laboratories, on massive farms, in slaughterhouses, in circuses, or in lonely backyards, you can depend on PETA to do all that we can to expose—and stop—abuse, exploitation, and neglect.

In addition to your gift, there are many other ways you can do more for animals right now. Order PETA President Ingrid Newkirk’s fascinating book Animalkind—now out in paperback—and learn more about the mesmerizing lives of animals and what you can do to help ensure that they’re protected and respected, listen to one of our informative and inspiring podcast episodes, and, if you make purchases through Amazon, help animals while you shop by visiting Smile.Amazon.com and selecting “People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA)” as your charity.

 

 

Your financial support today is deeply appreciated by everyone here at PETA. Thank you!

 

 

Donations to PETA are in U.S. dollars and are tax-deductible to the fullest extent allowed by U.S. law. PETA's tax ID number is 52-1218336. You'll receive an e-mail receipt shortly, but please feel free to print or save this message for your personal records. Please double-check that your e-mail address below is correct:
